item.title: Ave Maria (Vavilov)
item.description: Incorrectly ascribed to Guilio Caccini, this work was actually composed by Vladimir Fyodorovich Vavilov (Влади́мир Фёдорович Вави́лов) in 1970 and featured in his album “Lute music of the XVI-XVII cent.” (Лютневая музыка 16-17 веков) released on the Melodiya label. I listened to the original recording, transcribed it to Notion, then rearranged it for woodwinds, strings and harp, voiced using the EWQL Symphonic Orchestra.

item.title: Winter Music
item.description: Music composed by Roger Eno and included in “Between Tides” album. Transcribed and orchestrated using Notion and EWQL Symphonic Orchestra Gold.
